title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid user details including username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that the user is registered successfully and redirected to the dashboard or login page.

title: User Registration Input Validation
description: Validate registration form input fields reject invalid data and show appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input invalid or incomplete data in username, email, and password fields.
Attempt to submit the registration form.
Verify error messages are shown for invalid or missing inputs and registration is not allowed.

title: User Login Success
description: Ensure users can log in successfully with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify the user is authenticated and redirected to the main dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect username/email or password and appropriate error is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input incorrect username/email or password.
Attempt to login.
Check that login is denied and error message is shown.

title: Session Management and Logout
description: Validate that user sessions persist correctly and logout functionality works.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Verify session token or cookie is set and user remains logged in across page reloads.
Click logout button.
Verify user session is cleared and user is redirected to the login page.

title: Navigation Component Responsiveness
description: Verify the top navigation, bottom navigation, and sidebar adapt correctly on different screen sizes and devices.

steps.description: Access the platform on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen resolutions.
Verify navigation components render properly and navigation controls are accessible and functional on all devices.

title: UI Components Consistency and Accessibility
description: Test reusable UI components (buttons, cards, inputs, modals) for consistent styling, functionality, and accessibility compliance.

steps.description: Render each UI component in isolation with various props and states (enabled, disabled, focused, error).
Verify components appear consistent across browsers and meet accessibility standards (ARIA roles, keyboard navigation).

title: Dashboard Home Page Functionality
description: Verify that the dashboard home page displays the welcome message and quick action buttons work correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard home page.
Verify the welcome message is visible.
Click on the quick action buttons (e.g., create star seed, view clusters).
Verify navigation to respective pages is successful and functional.

title: User Profile Page - Settings Update and Statistics
description: Validate that users can view and update their profile settings and see usage statistics accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the profile page after login.
Verify user information and usage statistics are displayed.
Modify profile settings such as display name or email.
Save changes.
Verify that changes persist and are reflected correctly.

title: Star Seed Creation Interface
description: Check that the star seed creation interface allows intuitive strain creation with validation and feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to the star seed creation page.
Fill in valid data for the virus strain creation.
Submit the creation form.
Verify that the star seed is successfully created and listed.
Input invalid or incomplete data.
Try to submit the form.
Verify validation errors appear and creation is blocked.

title: Star Clusters Page - Management and Viewing
description: Verify that users can view, search, and manage existing star clusters effectively.

steps.description: Navigate to the star clusters page.
Verify clusters are listed with correct details.
Use search or filter functionality to find specific clusters.
Verify results update correctly.
Perform cluster management actions such as edit or delete.
Verify changes are reflected accurately and no data inconsistencies occur.

title: Interactive Star Map Visualization Accuracy and Responsiveness
description: Ensure the star map visualizes geospatial data accurately and responds smoothly to user interaction such as zoom and pan.

steps.description: Navigate to star map component.
Verify displayed clusters correspond to backend data.
Zoom in/out and pan the map.
Verify map interactions are smooth with no visual glitches or delays.
Select a cluster on the map.
Verify cluster details are displayed correctly.

title: AI Service Vector Similarity Search Validity
description: Test that the AI backend processes vector similarity search requests returning accurate and timely matches.

steps.description: Send similarity search requests with valid vectors to the AI service.
Verify the AI service returns correct similarity results consistent with expected output.
Verify response times meet acceptable latency thresholds.
Send malformed or invalid vector data.
Ensure the AI service handles errors gracefully with valid error messages.

title: Vector Database Integration Stability and Accuracy
description: Verify the integration with ChromaDB correctly stores, retrieves, and manages vector data for similarity search.

steps.description: Add vectors representing virus strains to the database.
Query similarity data from the vector database.
Confirm retrieved data matches expected similarity relationships.
Attempt database operations with invalid data.
Verify errors are handled and logged without crashing the system.

title: Deployment using Docker and Zeabur - Build and Stability
description: Validate that the system components build correctly into Docker containers and deploy on Zeabur without downtime or failure.

steps.description: Execute Docker build process for frontend and backend images.
Verify images build with no errors.
Deploy containers to Zeabur cloud platform using provided configuration.
Ensure services start and remain stable during deployment.
Verify zero downtime with continuous availability via health checks and monitoring.

title: System Monitoring and Health Tracking
description: Test the comprehensive monitoring system tracks API usage, deployment status, and performance metrics effectively.

steps.description: Generate API traffic through various platform usage.
Verify monitoring dashboards/logs capture and display API usage statistics correctly.
Simulate deployment status changes or service failures.
Confirm monitoring detects issues and alerts are generated.
Check response times and performance metrics collection.
Validate metrics accuracy and timely reporting.

title: Security - Unauthorized Access Prevention
description: Verify that unauthorized users cannot access protected routes or perform restricted actions.

steps.description: Attempt to access dashboard, profile, create, clusters, or AI service endpoints without login.
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login.
Attempt data modification requests without a valid session.
Confirm that actions are rejected with appropriate error messages.

title: Error Handling in AI Service Backend
description: Validate that the FastAPI AI service gracefully handles invalid inputs and unexpected errors without crashing.

steps.description: Send malformed requests including invalid JSON, missing required fields, or unsupported operations.
Verify the AI service returns meaningful error codes and messages.
Simulate backend exceptions or failures.
Confirm the service logs errors and returns 5xx responses without crashing.

title: Performance under Load
description: Test system performance and scalability under high user and AI query load conditions.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent user registrations, logins, and strain creation.
Generate multiple simultaneous AI similarity search requests.
Verify system responsiveness stays within acceptable limits without failures.
Check cloud deployment scales resources correctly and recovers from load spikes.

title: Data Consistency across Frontend and Backend
description: Ensure that data changes made via UI are correctly reflected in backend and vice versa.

steps.description: Create and update virus strains or clusters via frontend forms.
Verify data persisted in backend matches input.
Modify data directly via backend or API.
Confirm frontend displays updated data correctly.
